alert.note: Alert for Calhoun (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 6:37PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Miller, Calhoun and Early Counties in southwestern Georgia through 715 PM EDT... At 637 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Blakely to near Columbia to near Ashford to near Cottonwood. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Morgan, Blakely, Edison, Arlington, Columbia, Douglasville, Centerville, Damascus, Jakin, Saffold, Parksville, Mayhaw, Rock Hill, Early Co A/p, Hentown, Hilton, Rowena, Howards Mill and Cordrays Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
